QuestData.Title: Estulan's Examination
QuestData.Description: He's right. I haven't been among the night elves long, but I can tell these markings are completely unlike any kaldorei decorations...$B$BEstulan needs to see this. Take this up the tower to him. He may be surly, but don't be dissuaded; once he sees the orb, he'll realize it's an important issue.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Gordunni Orb to Estulan.
QuestData.RewardText: Ahh, the orb I mentioned before. A decent reason to disturb me.
